Oliver - would you mind adding detailed instructions for reproducing this error,
preferrably based on a clean Lenya installation?
Thanks!

creator: oliver.schalch@wyona.com
text:
Sure, there ya go:

1) Build a clean Lenya 1.4
2) Start Lenya
3) Login as editor to default publication
4) Switch to the Site-Tab

5) Click on Tutorial 
6) Click on Create new doctype
7) Edit -> Delete
8) Confirm
9) Click on Authoring in Sitetree
10) You see that the "Directory" Tutorial is gone since there are no file
anymore in it.
